score - Variable in class it.polimi.se2019.model.game.Player

score - Variable in class it.polimi.se2019.view.PlayerBoardView
 
scoreSingleBoard(Controller, PlayerBoard) - Static method in class it.polimi.se2019.controller.PlayerManager
this method scores the single PlayerBoard, dealing points Points dealt: - first blood: 1 point - (first) player with most damage: boardvalue points update of killshot track: - 1 damage token of color of player that dealt the killshot; 2 if it dealt also overkill Note: a kill happens on the 11th damage given : 1 token on the KST; : the board gets scored at the end of the turn Note: an overkill happens on the 12th damage given : double token on the KST; you get a mark from the player you overkilled Note: in frenzy, boards in frenzy mode do not offer first blood points

SingleCardActions - Class in it.polimi.se2019.controller
with a certain guncard you can: - use one, two or three effects in a certain order - select one or more targets from a list of players - move (yourself or others) by a given number of cells - inflict damage to players in a certain cell - inflict damage to one or more players in a certain cell Usage of effectsOrder: examples: {{"Base","Optional1","Optional2"}, {"Base","Optional2", "Optional1"}} or {{"Base"}, {"Alternative"}} meaning that you can either use one or the other.
SingleCardActions(Controller, GunCard, FictitiousPlayer) - Constructor for class it.polimi.se2019.controller.SingleCardActions
